History confirms Republicans rejected a once-in-a-lifetime immigration opportunity  —  Immigration politics may be the most important to winning and losing elections in America.  Add the substance around immigration reform and border security and it is one of the most complicated policy issues facing America as well.

Helicopter crashes in California with 6 people on board  —  The Eurocopter EC 130 helicopter crashed Friday around 10 p.m. local time.  —  A helicopter crashed Friday night near Nipton, California, with six people on board, the Federal Aviation Administration said.
